branchCategory.name: 11-LEJS, Electric Actuator, High Rigidity Slider Type Ball Screw Drive AC Servo Motor, Clean Room
branchCategory.description: <P>The LEJS is the clean room version of SMC's high rigidity slider.  The actuator has built-in vacuum piping with an exhaust port to achieve the ISO Class 4 standard.  The 11-LEJS is available exclusively with an AC servo motor.  The actuator features a substantially wider load mounting platform than the LEFS, supported internally by a double axis linear guide for reduced moment deflection.  The AC servo motor enables higher speed and acceleration, as well as a high-load size 63 model exclusive to LEJ.  The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.</P>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 40, 63 <LI>Maximum workload: 85 kg <LI>Maximum speed: 1800 mm/s (H lead) <LI>Maximum stroke: 1500 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder <LI>ISO Class 4 / US FED STD 209E Class 10 <LI>Built-in vacuum piping with exhaust port for removing generated particles </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: 11-LEJS, Electric Actuator, High Rigidity Slider Type Ball Screw Drive AC Servo Motor, Clean Room
